original_text: I am like a good builder. God has given that job to me and he has helped me to do it well. I was the person who built the foundation. Now other people are building on that foundation. But each person must be careful how he builds.
korean_text: 내게 주신 하나님의 은혜를 따라 내가 지혜로운 건축자와 같이 터를 닦아 두매 다른 이가 그 위에 세우나 그러나 각각 어떻게 그 위에 세울까를 조심할지니라

sentences.original_text: I am like a good builder.
God has given that job to me
and he has helped me to do it well.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 내가 그 일을 잘 하도록 도와주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: I was the person who built the foundation.
Now other people are building on that foundation.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 다른 사람들이 그 기초 위에 세우고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: But each person must be careful how he builds.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 각 사람은 어떻게 세우는지 조심해야 합니다.
